description: Adversaries may use a non-application layer protocol for communication between host and C2 server or among infected hosts within a network
name: Ncat Execution
query: (process.executable:(*\\ncat.exe OR *\\netcat.exe) OR process.command_line:(*\ \-lvp\ * OR *\ \-lvnp* OR *\ \-l\ \-v\ \-p\ * OR *\ \-lv\ \-p\ * OR *\ \-l\ \-\-proxy\-type\ http\ * OR *\ \-\-exec\ cmd.exe\ * OR *\ \-vnl\ \-\-exec\ *))
author: frack113
Florian Roth
